words.translate: *You get the text from the API, but its not really that useful...

Did you know? 
A good chunk of fires are caused by intentionally burning grass
Low on water? Just pick up a water bottle!
Remember: You can aim while shooting

Did you know? Sometimes, Game hints
can appear here, so keep your eyes open, else you'll miss them!

Position yourself efficiently 
so you can cover more space with a single shot!

Did you know? 
You can see fire statistics in the region via 
NASA FIRMS
(To see them, just copy this link)
https://firms.modaps.eosdis.nasa.gov/
